item.title: Australian Treasurer Calls ANZ CEO Over Job Cuts, The Australian Says
item.description: Australian Treasurer Jim Chalmers spoke to ANZ Group Holdings Ltd.’s boss Nuno Matos on Tuesday about the bank’s plan to cut thousands of jobs, the Australian reported.

item.title: ANZ CEO Unleashes ‘Nunogeddon’ on Bankers Alarmed by Job Cuts
item.description: In just four months, Nuno Matos has dismantled the decade-long legacy of ANZ Group Holdings Ltd.’s former boss Shayne Elliott.
